'''Golden Chicken Burger''' is a [[food]] item originally designed for the {{w|KFC}} × [[Genshin Impact]] crossover event.

Its recipe can be obtained from the login event [[Outland Gastronomy]].

Depending on the quality, Golden Chicken Burger restores '''30'''/'''32'''/'''34'''% of Max HP and an additional '''600'''/'''1,250'''/'''1,900''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this can not target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
